name: Holy Light Beam cannon
description:
The Holy Light Beam Cannon - otherwise known as Holy light or HLBC, is a testament to Knights Manufacturing's ambition, presenting the pinnacle of the limited energy weapon development KM has performed.
Going with the trend of old Cradle Arthurian legends, the HLBC is mean to inspire awe, fear and evoke the image of divine retribution.
The charging sequence of the HLBC is a spectacle on its own, as energy seemingly comes out of nowhere (while in reality it is being released through tiny spikes on the capacitor units), quickly filling the firing chamber with a shining, golden light, adding to the sense of imagery of a divine weapon.
Once a weapon that was often used to protect the population of KM factory worlds, now has become twisted, used by Fields Network to perform deeds beyond reasoning.

tags.description: This weapon can only be fired before the user moves or takes any other actions on their turn, excepting Protocols. The user can still act and move normally after attacking. Additionally, because of its size, this weapon can’t be used against targets in engagement with the user’s mech, and cannot be used for Overwatch.

name: Armsman
description: The armsman is a compact, semi-automatic pistol designed for close-to-medium range engagements. Its polymer frame keeps it lightweight and maneuverable, while its reinforced barrel and slide ensure durability even under heavy use. The Armsman's integrated targeting system aids in acquiring and tracking targets, making it a reliable choice for pilots who need accurate firepower in a pinch.
